chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
y: SF_seq
x: SF_seq

Goal:
last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)

Premises:
SF_cat = fun (T : Type) (x y : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h x; SF_t := SF_t x ++ SF_t y |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
seq_step_cat : forall x y : seq R, (0 < size x)%nat -> (0 < size y)%nat -> last 0 x = head 0 y -> seq_step (x ++ behead y) = Rmax (seq_step x) (seq_step y)
SF_last_cat : forall x0 y0 : SF_seq, last (SF_h x0) (SF_lx x0) = head (SF_h y0) (SF_lx y0) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x0 y0)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x0 y0)) = last (SF_h y0) (SF_lx y0) where ?T : [x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
ptd_cons : forall (h : R * R) (s : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv (SF_cons h s) -> pointed_subdiv s
Rmax_assoc : forall x y z : R, Rmax x (Rmax y z) = Rmax (Rmax x y) z
ptd_sort : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> SF_sorted Rle ptd
ptd_sort' : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
SF_head = fun (T : Type) (y0 : T) (s : SF_seq) => (SF_h s, head y0 (SF_ly s)) : forall T : Type, T -> SF_seq -> R * T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
SF_last = fun (T : Type) (y0 : T) (s : SF_seq) => last (SF_h s, y0) (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, T -> SF_seq -> R * T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
SF_lx_cat : forall x0 y0 : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x0 y0) = SF_lx x0 ++ behead (SF_lx y0) where ?T : [x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
zip = fun S T : Type => fix zip (s : seq S) (t : seq T) {struct t} : seq (S * T) := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => match t with | [::] => [::] | y :: t' => (x, y) :: zip s' t' end end : forall S T : Type, seq S -> seq T -> seq (S * T) Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope seq_scope]
OmegaLemmas.OMEGA2 : forall x y : Z, (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x + y)%Z
SF_behead = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := head (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)); SF_t := behead (SF_t s) |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s) = last 0 (SF_lx s) where ?T : [x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
Z.gt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Z.lt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Lt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
nfloor : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> nat
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zopp_plus_distr : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (- x + - y)%Z -> P (- (x + y))%Z
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Zeq_bool = fun x y : Z => match (x ?= y)%Z with | Eq => true | _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
SF_cons = fun (T : Type) (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := fst h; SF_t := (SF_h s, snd h) :: SF_t s |} : forall T : Type, R * T -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
SF_size_lx : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s) = S (SF_size s) where ?T : [x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_lx_rev : forall s : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_rev s) = rev (SF_lx s) where ?T : [x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
